resources.string: The simple dice sequence roller. On the \"Rolls\" tab, tap a dice to add it to a sequence. Dice are represented in the format of [count]d[sides] or 1d6 for a six sided dice. Once you are satisfied with your sequence, press \"Roll\" and see the results. Pressing the \"Heart\" icon will save your sequence for later use. Pressing the Trash button will clear the sequence if youre on the \"Roll\" tab or will clear your history if youre on the \"History\" tab. Tapping any list item will reroll that item.
This is where your saved rolls will appear. To save a roll, go back to the \"Roll\" tab and create a sequence of dice. Then press the \"Heart\" icon in the bottom left corner.
This is where your previous rolls will appear. Any sequence of dice rolls in any of these tabs will appear here.
